data.lyric:
[ti:Is That Alright? (《一个明星的诞生》电影插曲)]
[ar:Lady Gaga]
[al:A Star Is Born Soundtrack (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Is That Alright? - Lady Gaga
[00:02.25]Lyricist：Aaron Raitiere/Lukas Nelson/DJ White Shadow/Nick Monson/Mark Nilan Jr./Lady Gaga
[00:04.50]Composer：Aaron Raitiere/Lukas Nelson/DJ White Shadow/Nick Monson/Mark Nilan Jr./Lady Gaga
[00:06.75]Producer：Lady Gaga/Mark Nilan Jr./Nick Monson/Paul "DJWS" Blair
[00:09.01]Life is so simple
[00:13.19]A little boy a little girl
[00:18.27]Laughing and loving
[00:22.50]Trying to figure out the world
[00:27.57]It felt like summer
[00:29.60]When I kissed you in the rain
[00:31.92]And I know your story
[00:34.08]But tell me again
[00:37.93]Nothing you say wouldn't interest me
[00:40.33]All of your words are like poems to me
[00:42.66]I would be honored if you would take me as I am
[00:46.34]I want you to look right in my eyes
[00:54.97]To tell me you love me to be by my side
[01:04.73]I want you at the end of my life
[01:13.67]I wanna see your face when I fall with grace
[01:18.43]At the moment I die
[01:23.58]Is that alright
[01:28.03]Is that alright
[01:32.73]I hope you're still with me when I'm not quite myself
[01:41.79]And I pray that you'll lift me when you know I need help
[01:51.06]It's a warm celebration of all of our years
[01:55.77]I dream of our story of our fairy tale
[02:01.79]Family dinners and family trees
[02:04.15]Teaching the kids to say thank you and please
[02:06.55]Knowing if we stay together that things will be right
[02:10.16]I want you to look right in my eyes
[02:18.98]To tell me you love me to be by my side
[02:28.60]I want you at the end of my life
[02:37.55]I wanna see your face when I fall with grace
[02:42.29]At the moment I die
[02:48.49]Is that alright
[02:53.25]Is that alright
[02:57.76]Is that alright
data.trans:
[ti:Is That Alright? (《一个明星的诞生》电影插曲)]
[ar:Lady Gaga]
[al:A Star Is Born Soundtrack (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.25]//
[00:04.50]//
[00:06.75]//
[00:09.01]生活如此简单
[00:13.19]一个小男孩和一个小女孩
[00:18.27]坠入爱河 日日欢声笑语
[00:22.50]想要一起探索世界
[00:27.57]如同一场夏日热恋
[00:29.60]我们在雨里深情拥吻时
[00:31.92]我就知道你是个有故事的人
[00:34.08]但请你再为我讲述一遍
[00:37.93]你说的每一句话 我都兴趣盎然
[00:40.33]你对我说的情话如同诗歌般婉转动听
[00:42.66]若你能接受真实的我 那我一定会倍感荣幸
[00:46.34]我渴望与你四目相对
[00:54.97]在我耳边低语 说你爱我 会永远陪着我
[01:04.73]我想与你厮守到永远
[01:13.67]当我不再有神明眷顾时 我只想再见你一面
[01:18.43]可以吗
[01:23.58]可以吗
[01:28.03]可以吗
[01:32.73]我多希望 即使我迷失自我时 你仍能陪在我身边
[01:41.79]我祈祷着 你能在我需要帮助的时候 给我一点力量
[01:51.06]我们在一起的每年都有温馨的庆祝仪式
[01:55.77]我幻想着属于我们的童话故事
[02:01.79]有着家庭聚餐和长长的家谱
[02:04.15]教孩子们礼貌用语
[02:06.55]我觉得 只要我们能在一起 一切问题都会迎刃而解
[02:10.16]我渴望与你四目相对
[02:18.98]在我耳边低语 说你爱我 会永远陪着我
[02:28.60]我想与你厮守到永远
[02:37.55]当我不再有神明眷顾时 我只想再见你一面
[02:42.29]可以吗
[02:48.49]可以吗
[02:53.25]可以吗
[02:57.76]可以吗
